original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā uruvelāyam viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhi rukkha mūle paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena bhagavā sattāham eka pallaṅkena nisinnaḥ hoti vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rattiyā pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomapaṭilomaṁ sādhukaṁ manasākāsi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rattiyā pacchimam yāmam paṭiccasamuppādam anuloma paṭilomam sādhukam manasā akāsi

original: “Iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati,
analyzed: iti imasmin sati idam hoti imassa uppādā idam uppajjati

original: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati; yadidaṁ—
analyzed: imasmin asati idam na hoti imassa nirodhā idam nirujjhati
jāti paccayā jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā sambhavanti
evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti
avijjāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhaḥ
nāma rūpa nirodhā saṃ āyatana nirodhaḥ
jāti nirodhā jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsāḥ nirujjhanti
evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
